remarks: The lattice of subspaces is atomistic, i.e. any element is the supremum of its atoms.  Part of proof of Theorem 16.9 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 70. Hypothesis ( ~ shatomistici analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lssats.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssats.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lssats.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lssats $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> U = ( N ` U. { x e. A | x C_ U } ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d N x $.
$d S x $.
$d U x $.
